/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, bathed in the bright sunlight, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings on both sides. A few construction cranes punctuate the skyline, hinting at the ongoing development in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
